meanings.sent1: The lecturers at the university are very knowledgeable.
meanings.sent2: The lecturers explained the topic clearly to the students.
meanings.sent3: The lecturers decided to have a dance-off instead of giving a lecture.
meanings.sent4: The lecturers' words were like music to the students' ears.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lecturers pacing back and forth in the classroom stayed with the students.

meanings.sent1: Attending the lecturers' sessions helped me understand the subject better.
meanings.sent2: The lecturers' delivery style was engaging and informative.
meanings.sent3: During the lecturers, the students suddenly burst into a spontaneous dance.
meanings.sent4: The lecturers' impact on the students' minds was profound.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with anticipation before the lecturers began.
